entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Periods of snow beginning late this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
